title: A Way to preview all fonts within font folio?
content:
I am wondering, is there an easy way to preview all the fonts within fontfolio?

I am using a win xp platform.

I find it quite frustrating that some font preview programs only look into one folder, and not multiple levels of folders.

I find this very time consuming, and eats into project times, when trying to find the ’right’ font.

Can anyone suggest anything?

Would have searched the forums, but couldnt find a search facility.

Thanks
